br.com.concepting.framework.security.service.interfaces

Interface LoginSessionService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoginSessionServiceImpl

    public interface LoginSessionService
extends IService
    Interface contendo as assinaturas dos métodos que implementam as regras de negócio que envolvem o modelo de dados 'LoginSessionModel'.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    fvilarinho
